description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to
develop, implement and assess a K-5 general music program. The course emphasizes current
approaches such as those of Orff, Dalcroze and Kodaly as well as intercultural and interdisciplinary
learning.  Required field experience component.  Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in
fullname: Teaching of Music in the Elementary School
